ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: Built-in 1/3 inch Sony Effio CCD, color DSP. Signal System: NTSC
Horizontal Resolution: 600 TV Lines. Lens: 3.6 mm Wide Angle. Minimum Illumination: 0.002 Lux
Auto White Balance. Auto Electronic Shutter. Dynamic Noise Reduction
3 Axis Dome Design. Can be mounted on wall or ceiling
Package included: 1 x dome security camera, 1 x 12V DC power supply, 1 x video power security camera cable and 1 x bonus security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Dome Security Camera High Resolution 600TVL Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens for Home DVR CCTV Surveillance System with Power Supply and Extension Cable A23
